data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Adamaoua
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adamaoua, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 495,200 souls living in the state of Adamaoua with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Adamaoua, Cameroon.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Adamaoua hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Anca people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Anca people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Anca people is yours.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 495,200 people living in Adamaoua, Cameroon. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 45,548 believers in the state of Adamaoua to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Adamaoua, Cameroon, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

location.name: Adamaoua
location.people_groups_list: Suga, Baghap, Kari, Mambila, Cameroon, Mbum, Kamkam
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Suga, Baghap (27,000), Kari (8,100), Mambila, Cameroon (64,000), Mbum (83,000), Kamkam (2,200)
